author: <TEST James>
name: <TEST Hummus>

ingredients.name: 1 Lemon or 4 tablespoons of Lemon juice
1 and a half of Garlic clovers
1 and a half of teaspoons of Salt

snippet: 3 time winner, HOT HUMMUS you'll be loving it.

instructions.text: Drain can of chickpeas but leave some of the juice.
Squeeze the lemon for all its lemony goodness.
Combine all ingredients into the blender and blend until your desired consistency (I like it chunky).
Enjoy this equisite hummus and don't forget - it's better than Roberts...
